panel.title: Ratio of Positive to Negative Tweets

search.query: index=main sourcetype="3-tweets-export-log" tweet=*$tweet$* sentiment=* |eval confidence = round(case(sentiment=="POSITIVE", score_positive, sentiment=="NEGATIVE", score_negative, sentiment=="MIXED", score_mixed, sentiment=="NEUTRAL", score_neutral) * 100, 2) | timechart span=10y count(sentiment) by sentiment | addtotals | eval ratio=POSITIVE/NEGATIVE | eval NEGATIVE=if(isnotnull(NEGATIVE), NEGATIVE, 1) | eval POSITIVE=if(isnotnull(POSITIVE), POSITIVE, 1) | fields ratio
